p: It is important to modulate the lipid contents that circulate in the blood and the inhibition of intrahepatic lipid accumulation for the treatment of hepatic steatosis. C. longa increased the level of serum high-density lipoprotein (HDL) and lowered the level of serum LDL, TG, and total cholesterol against high-fat diet [ 21, 57â€“ 59], carcinogen [ 26, 29, 41, 45, 46], ethanol [ 34], and pesticides [ 42, 43]. In addition, C. longa decreased the regions of aortic fatty streak in rabbits with atherosclerosis [ 58]. The modulatory effects of C. longa against serum lipids might inversely aid in the reduction of lipid inflow into the liver tissue.
